title: Online Service-Learning Project: Participatory Design for Language Proficiency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Online service-learning design in response to non-face-to-face learning environment changes due to COVID-19. Utilizes gamification elements and real-time collaboration tools to encourage learner participation

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute language-based service projects to address community issues using an online platform
Learners can effectively communicate with team members and produce project deliverables using digital collaboration tools
Through reflective journaling, learners can reflect on and improve their language use experiences during service-learning
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
